The learning curve is higher than snoop dogg on top of the Burj Khalifa, would recommend for masochist friends until you play the game for around ~1273 hours and finally learn how to press space. 

Aside from a steep learning curve, the game has its strong suit in design and balancing (sometimes) and is exhilarating  when you participate in a good round. Fun with friends AND NO ONE ELSE, the community is toxic.

说实话很好玩，1V4非对称里面做的很好了，现在相对来说比较平衡。
萌新关于匹配，游戏设置，可以参考一下建议。
1.低段位人类水生火热，高段位屠夫水深火热。 如果你一开始玩人类疯狂开局三挂，可以考虑玩玩屠夫。但如果国服环境很差导致你每场都毫无体验，可以考虑换服。
2.游戏设置默认是60帧并且开启了垂直同步，有需要144hz或者关闭垂直同步可以去贴吧精品贴看教程或者直接百度。
3.有些地图会非常的黑，可以考虑提高屏幕亮度和将画面的色彩饱和度降低等方式。 这个比较麻烦，但如果屏幕自带FPS模式开启效果会好很多。
4.关于游戏萌新上手，人类技能都是可以传承的也就是后期哪个人物都一样，屠夫有自己的专属技能。萌新屠夫优先推荐夹子  护士不推荐。

ゲーム自体はとても面白いです。ゲームデザインもルールも神ゲーの部類だと思ってます
但し、そのゲームを運営調整する会社が控えめに言ってクソです

このゲームは人間４人と殺人鬼１人での非対称ゲームです
お互いどちらかが欠けているとゲームが始まりません
なのに割合の多い人間側のフラストレーションのみを取り除こうと必死になり
度重なる殺人鬼への弱体化。サイレント修正。その事による殺人鬼不足が深刻です
今まさに全殺人鬼必須級のパークまでも変更されようとしています

殺人鬼側が怒っていても少数の意見だからと嘲笑い、別ゲームやれよとまで言ってる運営さんですが
その少数が居なくなるとゲームが終わる事を理解していないようです
BOT殺人鬼を導入するなら話は別ですが、今のままなら人間側でのマッチングは絶望的です

今から新規で買う方にはオススメしません。
初心者の方が殺人鬼をやろうとするとほぼ負けます。
その上煽られチャット欄ではnooob　ezzzもありえます。
初心者の方で人間側ならスリルもあり楽しめると思います。
但しマッチング時間が凄いです。ランク帯によっては1試合するのに20分程かかります

神ゲーなのは間違いありません。
私は元々PS4で殺人鬼＆人間をやっていたのですがPTBもやりたくてPC版導入した程の
DBD大好きだった人間です
だからこそゲームが終わりかけてるのがとても悲しく思います
pretty fun. especially with friends.

Used to love playing this game, but I can't recommend it anymore due to the incompetent devs literally screwing over anyone who plays killer. This latest update (while only in the test servers right now) is about the worst thing to come out of this game, nerfing a essential perk for higher rank games without realizing WHY it gets used (hint: base gen speed repair is too fast) and making a bad killer WORSE (the doctor). they even have a survey for the test server update, but with NO mention of the hex: 
ruin change (very sneaky). I honestly thought EA was the worst game company, but these guys really take the cake.
очень крутая игра
iv had this game since day one and its been a great game. love every second of it.

This game has an amazing concept, good licenses and nice mechanics but the game can't be viewed in a competitive setting. Survivors are convinced that this game is killer sided and they will most likely convince you the same. 

MMR was brought into the game and I believe it doesn't have a good impact on the game. Instead of having to sweat every now and then as killer, you sweat almost on every single game. This MMR system also forces killers to play in a very mean way, so you can get frustrated from playing survivor aswell. 

I'm not exactly sure there's a balance team.

This game is very good, but you really good but you shouldn't think about it competitively. If you're not easily frustrated over losses then go ahead and play killer, if you want a more laid back gameplay... play mostly survivor.

I'll solely evaluate this game for casuals and it's a great game.

I'm so glad I uninstalled this piece of sh*t game. These developers are honestly the worst I have ever seen. They have no clue on how to balance their own game, are completely blind to the real problems, and worst of all waste so much time making pointless cosmetics and licensed bullsh*t.  Every single change they have been making to this game since I left has me baffled every time I see them. This game is an unbalanced, bug ridden, glitchy, incoherent mess. Not to mention the community surrounding this game is the most immature and toxic I've ever been around. Honestly at this point no amount of new content they add will bring me back.  Proper balancing would bring me back, but its BHVR so I'm fairly certain that's not happening anytime soon.

Still a sadist enough to try and keep playing this game. Have to verify game files EVERY SINGLE TIME before the game will launch fully. Queues are still horrid, as are hitboxes, and everything else tied to BHVR's McDonald's dedicated servers (sorry for the disrespect @McDonald's). The only thing BHVR seems to care about is streamlining and shoving out cosmetics, rather than making their game something fun and enjoyable. Keep focusing on anything but gameplay devs. It's fantastic for the longevity of this dumpster fire. *sarcasm for the dense ones*

If you're playing this game to only play Survivor then congrats, you will have a great time briefly while this game still has some die hard killer fans who put up with the devs nonsense. But if you're going into the game to play both roles 50/50 or, god forbid, prefer to play killer. Expect to get absolute destroyed by competent survivors and also the developers who clearly balance the game for low ranked survivor players. Even to the point of admitting it on live streams. This game is nothing but infuriating and you're better off not playing it. I've bought the game on PC, Playsation and the Switch and have an overall play time of 1K hours before you get mislead. 

It's a pity because the game designers are top notch, the new map designs and killer designs are fantastic (even if the survivors are all bland and uninteresting but that's more of a flaw with the game mechanics making survivors all the same). The main developers are ruining this game with their awful balance decisions and it's painful to watch. Don't bother buying the game because you're not going to enjoy it. Your 20 euro would have been better spent on DeathGarden but the DBD playerbase is so far shoved up its collective ass that it can't tell a bad developers from good ones.
заебись игра

I've played for about 30 hours, now, and I can honestly say I love this game; I have only played survivor mode, though, so my review will be limited to those experiences. The environments are detailed and laid out well. The mechanics are easy and simple enough to master, so the rest of the game is just working with your teammates and trying to get out. Fantastically enough, although the concept of that is redundant in nature, the in-game experience is not. The character perks and add on items are nice advantages, but you really don't need them to win a match. Overall, this is one of the best games I've played in a while, and I'm sure I'll enjoy it for months to come.

It is really fun! One of the best games of all time. My girlfriend and I play it all the time. She is really good at it, and we are like a freaking power couple it is amazing. If you have a girlfriend that likes to play horror games or just a game like DBD then play this with her. Although my girlfriend is a gamer girl so she is super good at it. <3.
Dont step into the light

As a player approaching 450 hours of gameplay in Dead by Daylight, it is no question to me that this game is complete utter trash. The only reason I remain playing the game is because of it's remarkable potential, and my friends who play the game as well. I will go over the major problems of the game that, if fixed, would hoist this game to an incredibly fun level.

The most glaring issue with Dead by Daylight besides the playerbase is the mechanically broken hitboxes that can be increasingly dissatisfying for both survivor players and killer players. It's unbelievable how degressed hitboxes have become since the initial release of the game many years ago. Nowadays, it is almost very common to be hit by a weapon that is noticably far away and not making contact, yet it is still frustrating every single time. And as killers, hitboxes involving hook techs and dedicated server lag also leave you questioning the commitment the developers have to making this game great. Hitboxes are a relatively easy fix to the game, and doing so would greatly improve the experience and leave players of all strengths much more satisfied, and it is perplexing that these have no been fixed yet.

The second most obvious issue is the playerbase and Behaviour's lack of enforcement and punishment of rulebreakers and toxic behavior. Problems such killers tunneling survivors or face camping are deliberate sabotage of another player's experience in the game, which is bad for business if anything, and it's shocking Behaviour has little enforcement of players abusing these issues. Countless times killers have targeted me, for no other reason other than their self satisfaction, and tunneled me while blatantly ignoring survivors or objectives as a whole. This behavior is glaringly toxic and ruins gameplay for many players and discourages new players from joining, but as of right now it is not punished for some unknown reason. There is not much that needs to be said for toxic behavior other than that enforcement is needed to cultivate a more welcoming and fair environment for new and veteran players alike.

There is other minor issues in the game right now such as balance but most of that is subject to opinion. With the current state of the game anyhow, I HIGHLY do NOT recommend playing Dead by Daylight as the experience is 90% of the time only frustrating and unenjoyable. With commitment to fixing the problems listed above, however, I think this game has amazing potential to be a very fun game.
The game has improved a lot. Whenever I encounter issues I just reinstall it. but overall the game is nice and matchmaking is not taking forever as survivor. As killer, it takes too long though

But the game has its ups. It can be incredibly fun, especially with friends. But as of 1/7/2020, the cons outweigh the pros.

Je pense que ce jeu mérite d'être acheter malgré le prix je ne pourrai pas juger si le prix équivaut pour pouvoir y jouer mais au fond ce jeu est bien fait. Pouvoir faire des custom si il y a peu de gens en ligne ou tout simplement pour jouer avec ses amis, la communauté est sympas de mon point du vue. Il y a un grand nombre de tueurs/survivants mais une grande partie payante ce qui n'affecte pas vraiment le jeu puisque sans payer on peut devenir très bon joueur est battre des gens qui use de l'argent. Il se peut qu'il y ait des petit glitch mais ça se corrige. Je recommande bien évidemment de jouer dans le noir et le soir entre potes pour bien avoir des effets de surprises et surtout de bien s'amuser!
